ygData.subject: Re: Question about multiple characters
ygData.msgSnippet: i started out with my human enchanter (after a 5 day vacation still lvl 20), but i also have a lvl 12 wood elf druid (got her there in 2 days playing time
ygData.messageBody:
i started out with my human enchanter (after a 5 day vacation still lvl
20), but i also have a lvl 12 wood elf druid (got her there in 2 days
playing time woooo), a lvl 3 gnome wiz that i just started, and a coupla
lvl 2 characters that i play for fun on random days.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
